base.title: Hackstead
base.description: A freshly hacked together Hackstead is what you have here! I see exciting new adventures in the future of this - cuts off - Hackstead!

rest.title: Housewarming
rest.description: Your parents, ever thankful that you finally have moved out of their home, gift you with a credit card that allows you to redeem one more Land Deed!

rest.title: This'll Do for Now
rest.description: In a feat of unparalleled engineering prowess, you can duct tape up a new plot, as long as you have a Land Deed, that is.

rest.title: Sew What Now?
rest.description: Only true Hackers can sew yet another piece of land onto their Hackstead! You can now do that if you redeem one more Land Deed!

rest.title: North Korea
rest.description: Now that you can redeem one more piece of land, you'll soon be approaching the size of everyone's favorite democracy!

rest.title: Stay a While...
rest.description: Listen closely, and you'll hear two more pieces of land being summoned into your contract via demonic forces! More Land Deed redemption is in your future!

rest.title: Something Completely Different
rest.description: By the power of noisy knights and crossdressing lumberjacks, you have the power to redeem two more empty plots!

rest.title: Barrel Welding
rest.description: The Muskonator himself espouses this crafty method of attaching more land to your hackstead! You are blessed with two more redeemable plots through him!

rest.title: Space Lasers
rest.description: Who knew that stealing this complex arrangement of magnifying glasses from the Elven technocracy would prove so useful? You've been able to use it to make room for three new pieces of land for your future redemption!

rest.title: Astartes
rest.description: A group of heavily armored space police bumble around on your property. They don't seem to be doing anything too harmful, and they even end up rewarding you with three more redeemable plots for your cooperation.

rest.title: Plothole
rest.description: You tear a huge gash in the fabric of reality, ripping from an alternate dimension the space to claim four more Land Deeds!

rest.title: Full House
rest.description: Turns out winning poker games against gods is a pretty fruitful endeavor, as they make all your Land Grants have quadruple the power!

base.title: Baked Like a Bractus
base.description: Right now this Bractus can only produce XP, but he's eager to do more!

rest.title: Doughy Drought
rest.description: In the pounding desert heat, this young Bractus only has the strength to provide one Bread Essence every six hours on yields.

rest.title: Bread Buddies
rest.description: This adorable Bractus is truly a man's best friend. It's soft and squishy and even comes with a 5% yield boost!

rest.title: Journey to the Yeast
rest.description: The Bread Heavens part and a crisp, golden light shines down on this Bractus, blessing it with 10% faster resource production.

rest.title: Rockin' and Rollin'
rest.description: Tall and proud with the horizon extended ahead, this Bractus now produces resources at a 10% higher rate.

rest.title: Playdough
rest.description: I'm sure you got yelled at as a kid for smushing your bread into tiny little balls ... No? Well that's what your Bractus has been up to, except these compressed bread things seem to be especially useful.

rest.title: Agglutination
rest.description: It seems like some powerful compounds are clumping together in your Bractus's photoreceptor units, as well as in its kneading organs! It can now produce 5% larger yields!

rest.title: Just Desserts
rest.description: Desert, dessert, desert, deserted by your friends in this horrible desert with no dessert ... but what's the difference when the sun has baked your brain to a nice crispy golden brown? Your Bractus can now produce 10% larger yields!

rest.title: Biscuits 'n Gravy
rest.description: Your Bractus has decided to start preparing Biscuits 'n Gravy for all of the other Bracti nearby. They find this delicious concoction to be quite invigorating, and as a result they can produce yields 10% more often!

rest.title: Gravy 'n Biscuits
rest.description: Your Bractus has decided to start sharing the recipe for its illustrious Biscuits 'n Gravy with the Bracti nearby, allowing them to produce yields 20% faster.

rest.title: New Baginnings
rest.description: News has been spreading of a mysterious goblin who has been sneaking little bags filled with treats to your plants.

Craft.title: :doughy_buzzwing_bagling: Bagling Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Doughy Buzzwing Baglings with a bressence for a 40% chance to get loot, a 36% chance to upgrade to a Boxling of another kind, or a 24% chance to transform into a Bagling of another kind.

rest.title: Breadbox
rest.description: Baglings can now be upgraded, transformed, or opened.

rest.title: Son of a Biscuit Eater
rest.description: Your Bractus has developed spikes which are well over a meter long. These deter carnivorous desert unicorns, allowing your now-unhindered Bractus to produce yields at a 20% faster rate.

rest.title: Butter My Biscuits
rest.description: Your Bractus now the ability to retract its spikes and has begun to secrete a delicious buttery substance which attracts nearby carnivorous unicorns. Once the unicorns begin licking the buttery substance, the Bractus extends its spikes, piercing the pale, bioluminescent flesh of the unicorns and draining their vital organs. This newfound source of nutrients allows your Bractus to produce 15% larger yields!

Craft.title: :doughy_buzzwing_boxling: Boxling Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Doughy Buzzwing Boxlings with 3 bressence for an 32% chance to get loot, a 30% chance to upgrade to a Boxlet of another kind, or a 38% chance to transform into a Boxling of another kind.

rest.title: Bready Unboxing
rest.description: Boxlings can now be upgraded, transformed, or opened.

rest.title: Birds and the Bread
rest.description: This Bractus has lived long and now can spread life across the vast reaches of the desert by making Eggs.

rest.title: Artificial Inflation
rest.description: You know how when you open a bag of chips only to find that it's half empty? Your Bractus figured out how to accomplish something similar by putting more air bubbles in its bread! Expect 20% more bountiful yields from now on!

Craft.title: :bractification_brew: Basic Brew
Craft.explanation: Brew up some brews with boosts of 10% and 5% to yield speed and size for your Bractus buddies! Craft with a 33% chance of success.

rest.title: Potent Potables
rest.description: Watering this Bractus with alcohol has provided some interesting results, as it has been processed into a golden fluid that can boost plant yield stats.

Craft.title: :doughy_buzzwing_boxlet: Boxlet Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Doughy Buzzwing Boxlets with 7 bressence for a 24% chance to get loot, a 24% chance to upgrade to a Megabox of another kind, or a 52% chance to transform into a Boxlet of another kind.

rest.title: Breadbox Bonzanza
rest.description: Boxlets can now be upgraded, transformed, or opened.

rest.title: Bread Growers' Association
rest.description: Your Bractus forms an official unofficial regulatory body with the other Bracti nearby, allowing them to produce 10% larger yields!

rest.title: Bread Growers' Guild
rest.description: Your Bractus's Bread Growers' Association is now complete with hazing, violent riots, freemason connections and 10% bigger yields for all neighboring Bracti!

rest.title: Bread Growers' Empire
rest.description: The Bread Growers' Association's influence has expanded unprecedentedly! Now helping local Bractus artisans with a 1.15 times increase to crafting speed.

Craft.title: :bold_bractification_brew: Bold Brew
Craft.explanation: Drop some courage into that liquid courage to make a potion which turns plants into Bracti!

rest.title: Bready Beverages
rest.description: While a young Bractus often grows in a dry area, powerful and mature Bracti often are the reason for the surroundings being so devoid of water, as they typically pull up more liquid than needed to secrete its buttery, golden sap. Using this natural tendency to drain and dry liquids on a certain powerful potion refines it to the point that it can transform other plants into Bracti.

Craft.title: :doughy_buzzwing_megabox: Megabox Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Doughy Buzzwing Megaboxes with 15 bressence for a 34% chance to get loot or a 66% chance to transform into a Megabox of another kind.

rest.title: Panera's Box
rest.description: Megaboxes can now be transformed or opened.

rest.title: Bread of Kings
rest.description: Bread has always been a staple fit for kings, and now bread returns the favor, giving you a recipe that will make any Rolling Pins into the pinnacle of majesty.

base.title: Crystal-less Chrysalis
base.description: Born without a single gem to its name, this plant will only give you XP for the time being.

rest.title: Intelligent Investment
rest.description: What it lacks in luster, it makes up for in its potential, but for now this Coffea Cyl can only give you a Cyl Crystal every six hours.

rest.title: Night Shift
rest.description: Uncovering some grime reveals that the Cyl Crystal was more orange than originally thought. The cheery hue comes with the ability to produce 5% larger yields.

rest.title: Periodic Coffee Table
rest.description: This Coffea Cyl has been working on a formula that should allow it to get more work done in less time. After ingesting it, your plant has its production speed boosted by a factor of 1.1!

rest.title: Caffeine Catastrophe
rest.description: Turns out that formula was just caffeine, and it's made your plant a bit too hyper... Well, at least you get another 10% speed boost for your yields.

rest.title: Chromatic Concentration
rest.description: Your Coffea Cyl has found that if it focuses all of its electromagnetic intensity on just a handful of Cyl Crystals, it can concentrate all of them into one extremely compressed crystcyl.

rest.title: Warm Up
rest.description: If you thought this plant was useful before, it might surprise you to hear that it was just getting started. It's begun to absorb even more light from the sun, and now this Coffea Cyl can support a 5% yield boost!

rest.title: Roasted!
rest.description: The sun's glaring heat has roasted this Cyl's arcane chemical compounds to dark, aromatic perfection, allowing it to produce 10% more during yields.

rest.title: Espresso Your Feelings
rest.description: This Coffea Cyl has grown to be quite empathic, and can commonly be found talking with others of its kind about their problems. As a result, its neighbors can produce yields 10% more often.

rest.title: Cylli Me
rest.description: This plant's antics lighten the burden of neighboring plants hard work in the field all day. They even allow them to work 1.2 times faster.

rest.title: New Baginnings
rest.description: An unknown person has been leaving behind bags by plants at night. No one has an inkling of their motive, but apparently the bags are filled with all kinds of useful things.

Craft.title: :crystalline_buzzwing_bagling: Bagling Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Crystalline Buzzwing Baglings with a crystcyl for a 40% chance to get loot, a 36% chance to upgrade to a Boxling of another kind, or a 24% chance to transform into a Bagling of another kind.

rest.title: Ground Up
rest.description: Baglings can now be upgraded, transformed, or opened.

rest.title: 100% Organic
rest.description: The natural wildfires of great forests reinvigorate the growth of the forest; the 100% organic flames in the branches of this Cyl are similarly vital, and they seem to allow it to produce yields 20% faster!

rest.title: Crystalline Bean
rest.description: The shine of the mystical crystals forming on this plant's limbs create ripples of warm energy in the air. Occasional sparks ignite around it, the warm energy giving your plant gains a 15% yield boost!

Craft.title: :crystalline_buzzwing_boxling: Boxling Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Crystalline Buzzwing Boxlings with 3 crystcyl for an 32% chance to get loot, a 30% chance to upgrade to a Boxlet of another kind, or a 38% chance to transform into a Boxling of another kind.

rest.title: Coffee Coffer
rest.description: Boxlings can now be upgraded, transformed, or opened.

rest.title: Sparks of Brilliance
rest.description: The rays passing through the glistening boughs of polished Cyl can now ignite life when certain materials are present, allowing for the flame of life to carry on within crafted Eggs.

rest.title: Clear As Crystal
rest.description: Searing heat on a hot summer's day makes the horizon shimmer and shift; your Coffea Cyl seems to be enveloped with a similar shimmer, and its yields are now 20% more bountiful as a result.

Craft.title: :cyllicizing_coffee_concoction: Classic Concoction
Craft.explanation: Concoct some concoctions with supports of 10% and 5% to yield speed and size for your Coffea Cyl companions! Craft with a 33% chance of success.

rest.title: Swell Swill
rest.description: While favoring coffee cannibalism, this Cyl is quite the mixologist. Doing its best work in fits of drunkenness, it can make a drink that could make any Cyl feel empowered.

Craft.title: :crystalline_buzzwing_boxlet: Boxlet Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Crystalline Buzzwing Boxlets with 7 crystcyl for a 24% chance to get loot, a 24% chance to upgrade to a Megabox of another kind, or a 52% chance to transform into a Boxlet of another kind.

rest.title: Crystalline Coffer
rest.description: Boxlets can now be upgraded, transformed, or opened.

rest.title: Something Brewing
rest.description: All the plants in the neighborhood know that something is up...Clouds gather around your plant. Of course, these are the effect of its famous coffee, the Zach Latte, made from the remains of distant cousins! Your plant shares these stewed entrails to its neighbors, giving them a 1.1 times boost to all yields!

rest.title: Towards the Horizon
rest.description: Shining like a fiery afternoon sky, the beams of light fragmenting from this Coffea Cyl empowers others of its kind nearby with a 10% boost to yields for its neighbors.

rest.title: Caesar's Pride
rest.description: Named after a season known for landscapes of brightly-colored leaves, the august shine of this plant's crystalline structure shines onto its neighbors, multiplying their crafting speeds by 1.15.

Craft.title: :scintillating_cyllicizing_coffee_concoction: Complex Concoction
Craft.explanation: Create a crazy coffee mixture that can change plants into Coffea Cyl!

rest.title: Foam Fountain
rest.description: Your Cyl has shown the characteristic of making any fluids it has contact with more caffeinated with prolonged contact. While this has destroyed many ecosystems, it has also allowed for a new drink that transforms others into Cyls to become a possibility.

Craft.title: :crystalline_buzzwing_megabox: Megabox Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Crystalline Buzzwing Megaboxes with 15 crystcyl for a 34% chance to get loot or a 66% chance to transform into a Megabox of another kind.

rest.title: Midas's Masterpiece
rest.description: Megaboxes can now be transformed or opened.

rest.title: Orange You Glad?
rest.description: Imbued with the power of the stars themselves, this Coffea Cyl has ascended to a whole new level of power. It's aura can be imbued into a Cyl Wand over time, giving it the power and properties of a Cytrus Staff.

base.title: Ivy Initiation
base.description: This Vine is at the bottom of the ladder for now, but it will soon climb to the top, giving you XP along the way.

rest.title: Really Got a Hold On Me
rest.description: You're so fond of this little vine you just wanna love it forever and not let go. After all, it can already produce Hacker Spirit for you every six hours!

rest.title: Duct Duct Goose
rest.description: This Vine has constructed a vocal cord for itself out of duct tape, which allows it to communicate effectively with other nearby Hacker Vibes Vines using an assortment of goose sounds. This somehow increases the yield size of this Vine by 5%.

rest.title: Hacker Culture Horticulture
rest.description: This Vine has had some nights learning on forums, and has learned to optimize its production to be 1.1 times as fast.

rest.title: Fey Fines
rest.description: The elves made a mistake when they leased this land to you! As compensation, they weave arcane runes into the air, making this plant produce yields 10% faster!

rest.title: Vine Combined
rest.description: By slapping some duct tape on old Hacker Spirits, this Vine can make hacksprits with the power of five Spirits in one!

rest.title: Perennial Programming
rest.description: Making amazing things is the gift that keeps on coming back, and in the case of your vine, it'll keep coming back bigger than ever! Your vine can now produce 5% larger yields.

rest.title: Stem Education
rest.description: After taking a class on the optimal stem width to rigidness ratio, your vine is now able to hold more Hacker Spirit aloft on its branches. Expect 10% greater yields!

rest.title: Morning Glory
rest.description: Most people think that programmers are night owls, but this Hacker Vibes Vine prefers it when the bright rays of early morning sunlight make their leaves glisten with dew. Quiet reflection during these early mornings has made this vine realize how to help its neighbors have yields 10% more often!

rest.title: Social Climber
rest.description: Having a pretty amicable personality allows this Vine to make friends with peers in its field. Its helpful responses and support makes him a platform for giving others a 20% boost to yield speed.

rest.title: New Baginnings
rest.description: There's apparently been some bags randomly appearing next to plants in the night. Reports suggest that a mysterious stout figure has been leaving these goodie bags.

Craft.title: :spirited_buzzwing_bagling: Bagling Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Spirited Buzzwing Baglings with a hacksprit for a 40% chance to get loot, a 36% chance to upgrade to a Boxling of another kind, or a 24% chance to transform into a Bagling of another kind.

rest.title: Hack in the Box
rest.description: Baglings can now be upgraded, transformed, or opened.

rest.title: Honeysuckle, I'm Home
rest.description: Due to its size, this Vine has become home to a few small creatures, especially birds. Of course, these creatures take care of their home sweet home, and help make yields 20% faster.

rest.title: Scandent Sourcerer
rest.description: This code wizard uses some spooky black magic shortcuts to make yields have 15% more resources.

Craft.title: :spirited_buzzwing_boxling: Boxling Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Spirited Buzzwing Boxlings with 3 hacksprit for an 32% chance to get loot, a 30% chance to upgrade to a Boxlet of another kind, or a 38% chance to transform into a Boxling of another kind.

rest.title: Hacking Outside of the Box
rest.description: Boxlings can now be upgraded, transformed, or opened.

rest.title: Ivy League
rest.description: Getting into the Ivy League is no small feat, but this plant makes it look easy. After many all-nighters, it even learned how to engineer life in the form of Eggs!

rest.title: Back to Our Roots
rest.description: Remembering its passion-filled projects from its youth, this Vine redoubles its efforts into making, which boosts the magnitude of its production by 1.2.

Craft.title: :vibefying_vinefying_elixir: Easy Elixir
Craft.explanation: Ferment some elixirs with fixes of 10% and 5% to yield speed and size for your Hacker Vibes Vine friends! Craft with a 33% chance of success.

rest.title: Alcoholic Attraction
rest.description: This Vine will cling to a bottle of hard liquor like it's a tree trunk. Refining the vomit that results from its inebriated state will make a beverage which can make any other Vines work more efficiently.

Craft.title: :spirited_buzzwing_boxlet: Boxlet Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Spirited Buzzwing Boxlets with 7 hacksprit for a 24% chance to get loot, a 24% chance to upgrade to a Megabox of another kind, or a 52% chance to transform into a Boxlet of another kind.

rest.title: Box of Bark
rest.description: Boxlets can now be upgraded, transformed, or opened.

rest.title: Ivy Induction
rest.description: When your coding prowess is well-known, it isn't unheard of for secret organizations to reach out. This Vine joined its local cult, sharing its skills as well as improving    yields for neighbors by 10%.

rest.title: Cult Conduction
rest.description: With your Vine's contributions to the cult, it has become a high-ranking member. Your Vine uses its new status to support nearby members a further 10%.

rest.title: Cloud Vine
rest.description: Your Hacker Vibes Vine can now upload all of its secrets and data onto the cloud, where other vines can access them. Expect 15% faster crafting from all of this Vines neighbors!

Craft.title: :vibefying_vinefying_elixir: Extravagant Elixir
Craft.explanation: Boiling up this fanciful, green liquid with the right ingredients makes a Vine juice so potent, it transforms plants into Vines themselves!

rest.title: Fine Vines
rest.description: Never let it be said that Vines don't age well. In fact, the healthy glitter of dew on its leaves remain forever fresh. Adding a specific potion to rest upon its grand foliage will eventually return a potent potion that will turn other plants into Vines themselves.

Craft.title: :spirited_buzzwing_megabox: Megabox Breakdown
Craft.explanation: Craft your Spirited Buzzwing Megaboxes with 15 hacksprit for a 34% chance to get loot or a 66% chance to transform into a Megabox of another kind.

rest.title: Vim Cubed
rest.description: Megaboxes can now be transformed or opened.

rest.title: Botany Oddity
rest.description: After many protein pills and excessive amounts of coffee, this Vine has grown into space! Its many leaves float in a peculiar way, and it says the planet looks pretty blue. While watching the stars swirl around, it had an epiphany, and can now upgrade your Vine Keyboards into Jungleboards.

base.title: In the Dust
base.description: Out of the dust, a wonderful little plant has materialized. It's not much right now, but your baby Aloe will soon grow, gathering XP from the blue ashes it continues to produce.

rest.title: Wading In
rest.description: Your young Aloe is already trying to summon Warp Powder - how determined! Your plant has a 70% chance of obtaining Warp Powder.

rest.title: Aloe Alone
rest.description: Introverted and quiet, your mysterious plant is a singularity in solidarity and has started working more efficiently. Their yield size has experienced a 1.05 size boost.

rest.title: Why So Blue?
rest.description: This plant seems to have become existential, being extremely intelligent. We might need to introduce them to some friends. Yield size has increased by 7%.

rest.title: Smooth Tunes
rest.description: A little music while you work can really get things moving. This holds especially true for this plant, who gets a 5% bonus to yield speed.

rest.title: Dust Smites
rest.description: This plant can't stand any dust that isn't its own. It periodically shoots out waves of powder that clear up those nasty Dust Bunnies of Caerbannog, giving its neighbors a 1.3 times speed boost.

rest.title: Vera Nice to See You
rest.description: Conversing with their neighbors has improved the Aloe's spirits! Their happy mood has increased their yield size by 10%.

rest.title: Aloewance
rest.description: Your plant pal has prayed to their astronomical aloe ancestors for greater yields - and they provided! Your plant gets a 1.1 yield size boost!

rest.title: Purple Haze
rest.description: The groovy succulent has sped up productivity after listening to some Jimi Hendrix. Far out, your speed has seen a 10% swell!

rest.title: Avanta Garde
rest.description: Novelty strikes very rarely, but when an inspired Aloe has an idea, it usually lets them compress and dissect Powders into another ... which is what this idea does.

rest.title: Aloe Advantage
rest.description: Ingesting Warp Powder has enlightened your plant, and they will now support their friends to help their species grow. Neighbor yield size has seen a 1.15 increase!

rest.title: Soothing Soot
rest.description: Working hard usually makes one hot and stufy, but the natural coolant that this Aloe emits in the form of dust helps its neighbors manage their temperatures, boosting their overall production by 20%.

Craft.title: :powder_keg: Powered Potion
Craft.explanation: Powders are pretty potent on their own, but to truly bring out their potential, you can make a Powder Keg that boosts their effects by 10%. Craft with a 40% chance of success.

rest.title: Nitroglycerin Nursery
rest.description: After some extensive testing - and a few fires - your Aloe Avanta has found itself able to make a gelatinous liquid substance that can improve the effectiveness of Powders. Just try not to let it catch fire; there's some liquor in there.

rest.title: Warp Speed
rest.description: Having taken the plant equivalent of hard cocaine, this plant now can turn out yields 1.15 times faster.

rest.title: Powder Power
rest.description: With the power of this plant's powder, we've started generating very potent material. There is now a base 25% chance of getting Rift Powder on yields.

rest.title: Gel Guru
rest.description: Using the starry blue gel from one of it's bountiful leaves, the Aloe has increased it's yield size with a 15% enhancement.

rest.title: Successful Succulent
rest.description: Your Aloe Avanta has become famous for their brilliant, galactic style. Along with newfound confidence comes the perk of having their yield size increased by 15%!

Craft.title: :portent_powder_keg: Perfect Potion
Craft.explanation: Pouring copious amounts of Powder into an already powerful, powderful potion makes a Portent Powder Keg that boosts Powder power upon neighbors by 35%

rest.title: Expedited Explosions
rest.description: Your Aloe has learned how to use quantum injectors to carefully place nanoparticles in Powder Kegs which greatly increase its explosive properties, but more importantly, its capability to boost Powder efficiency for neighboring plants.

rest.title: Fate of the Stars
rest.description: The shine of your Aloe's twinkling lights has dwarfed some of the galaxy's greatest wonders. The intense sparkles are actually the effect of a process that boosts yield size by 1.2.

rest.title: Aloe Savanta
rest.description: This Aloe has been designated a certified genius! They've started producing a mysterious, powerful powder with the uncanny ability to twist the fabric of space-time. There is now a slim 3% base chance of getting Wormhole Powder.

Craft.title: :tinkerpart: Learning and Burning
Craft.explanation: Burn a Tinkerpart to get some quick XP for your plants! There's also a small chance for something special.

Craft.title: :tinkerpart: More Learning and More Burning
Craft.explanation: After some trial by fire, your Tinkerstool has found more Tinkerparts means more fire and more XP, and a chance for a secret drop!

Craft.title: :tinkerpart: Even More Learning and Even More Burning
Craft.explanation: Arson is truly an educational experience. Burn a bunch of Tinkerparts and get a crazy big fire, some XP, as well as good odds for something extra.

base.title: Tinkerer's Tools
base.description: The Tinkerstool is a strange plant gifted with the knowledge of crafting from birth. They even gain XP from the endeavor of crafting.

rest.title: Speedy Spores
rest.description: The occasional spores that this Tinkerstool expels in small clouds boost the crafting speed of items it makes by 5%.

rest.title: Pressing Buttons
rest.description: Pressing issues are rarely fixed by just pressing buttons, but this cute as a button mushroom is too pressed for time! This work rush pushes him to craft 5% faster.

rest.title: Fast Like a Fungus
rest.description: Fungal colonies naturally grow at impressive speeds. This Tinkerstool has found a way to channel this effect into crafting, allowing crafting to go 7% quicker.

rest.title: Basidia in Bulk
rest.description: Are you tired of crafting items one at a time? Well so is this Tinkerstool! With the cost of a few Tinkerparts, items can now be produced in bulk with the efficiency and efficacy of a fungus factory!

rest.title: Gillded Girdle
rest.description: The utility belt has been upgraded to have even more arms and tools, boosting crafting speed by 7%.

rest.title: Mycelium Mechanics
rest.description: A talented Tinkerstool as this one has built a drone to assist in the workshop. Affixed to the Tinkerstool's belt when not used, this machine helps with the heavy lifting, making things run 8% faster.

rest.title: Scrapyard Shenanigans
rest.description: This frugal fungus is able to salvage excess materials from his projects, reworking them into more crafts! This allows for a 0.5% chance to have double the yield!

rest.title: Toadstool Technology
rest.description: Your Tinkerstool has designed a utility belt for itself. This belt allows it to have tools and mechanical appendages that offer control over micromovements that cost others precious items and give a 1.5% chance for crafting to return used materials!

rest.title: Flux Capacitor
rest.description: Great Scott! Put on your thinking caps and get ready to go 88 miles an hour, because this plant has found a way to stabilize, separate, and contain the dimensional overflow from Powders! While not totally efficient, this allows the ability to deconstruct and reconstruct Powders.

rest.title: Chanterelle Enchantments
rest.description: Turns out this modish mushroom has mastered a modicum of magical measures, allowing crafting speed to be increased by another 10%.

rest.title: Underground Upgrades
rest.description: Every now and then, some parts and tools can't be easily found. When that happens you have to go underground. The black market is shady, but fast, with a 1.1 times speed boost to offer.

rest.title: Largely Licensed
rest.description: Apparently, some interesting permits are needed to do interesting things ... Now that you have them, your Tinkerstool gets the benefit of sometimes being reimbursed for his work, with 2% greater chance to keep items spent on crafting.

rest.title: Sporadic Spectacles
rest.description: The specs on this Tinkerstools spectacles have been specially upgraded to allow it to see the internal workings of most machines, opening up crafting to include the tools of the trade: the Tinkersledge, Tinkerdriver, and Tinkerlight.

Craft.title: :cyllicizing_coffee_concoction: Classic Concoction
Craft.explanation: Concoct some concoctions with supports of 12% to yield speed for your Coffea Cyl companions! Craft with a 45% chance of success.

Craft.title: :vibefying_vinefying_elixir: Easy Elixir
Craft.explanation: Ferment some elixirs with fixes of 12% to yield speed for your Hacker Vibes Vine friends! Craft with a 45% chance of success.

Craft.title: :bractification_brew: Basic Brew
Craft.explanation: Brew up some brews with boosts of 12% to yield speed for your Bractus buddies! Craft with a 45% chance of success.

rest.title: Amanita Alchemist
rest.description: With the power of drunk science, this Tinkerstool has done drink science. That is to say, that it has developed new formulas and machinery to create drinks which can boost plant yields.

rest.title: Compost Composition
rest.description: Having a hobby for one's spare time is nice, and this composed composer's compositions fill rooms with tunes - tunes that help him work 15% faster when on the job.

rest.title: Spore Downpour
rest.description: The spores that were keeping things moving before are now more frequent, and in greater amount, making small clouds and giving an extra 15% boost to crafting speed.

rest.title: King of the Craft
rest.description: Keeping an orderly workspace can be pretty taxing, but this Tinkerstool has class and control... until you call him a plant. He's a fungus. And as a fungus, the chance of craft bonuses is increased to 0.8%.

Craft.title: :tinker_tincture: Alcohol Alchemy
Craft.explanation: With bubbling beakers and spinning centrifuges all around, you can make a Tinker Tincture that boosts crafting speed by 10%. Craft with a 50% chance of success.

Craft.title: :terrific_tinker_tincture: Amazing Alchemy
Craft.explanation: With expert precision, your Tinkerstool can whip up a potent Terrific Tinker Tincture that boosts crafting speed by 30%.

Craft.title: :powder_keg: Powered Potion
Craft.explanation: Powders are pretty potent on their own, but to truly bring out their potential, you can make a Powder Keg that boosts their effects by 10%. Craft with a 50% chance of success.

rest.title: Superb Solutions
rest.description: While in a stupendous Siberian stupor, this Tinkerstool was inspired to research an assortment of alcohols with unique abilities, which it can now craft!

rest.title: In the Hall of the Mushroom King
rest.description: As adept a crafter as the ancient dwarves of old, this Tinkerstool has developed a forging technique that combines the tools of its trade into one Tinkermultitool.

possession_archetypes.name: Gempheus
possession_archetypes.description: The boundless buzzing, crackling energy found in Cyl Crystals manifests itself in Gempheus's personality! That is to say, Gempheus early in the morning is a little more than most people can handle.

advancement.title: Hackagotchi Help!
advancement.description: Having a Gempheus increases the yield size of this Coffea Cyl 50%!

possession_archetypes.name: Hackpheus
possession_archetypes.description: Enjoys long hacks on the beach, and thinks that posting her dating profile bio here is somehow not appropriate. You can hear less profanity from this one.

advancement.title: Hackagotchi Help!
advancement.description: Having a Hackpheus increases the yield size of this Hacker Vibes Vine 50%!

possession_archetypes.name: Chefpheus
possession_archetypes.description: A cute Hackagotchi who is into baking! She can actually only make bread, as we all know from the Great Cake Fire of '19.

advancement.title: Hackagotchi Help!
advancement.description: Having a Chefpheus increases the yield size of this Bractus 50%!

possession_archetypes.name: Warp Powder
possession_archetypes.description: Sparkling, glittery, glowing blue powder that emits high-pitched squeaking noises, especially when excited. It has been known to accelerate time.

plant_rub_effects.short_description: Grow this plant 2 extra hours in 6 minutes!

PlantAdvancement.title: Warped Away
PlantAdvancement.description: This Powder flares up on contact with your plant, creating a small bubble of accelerated time around it.

possession_archetypes.name: Rift Powder
possession_archetypes.description: A volatile compound that easily tears the fabric of spacetime. Its powerful time acceleration properties were last recorded in the ancient books of the Brognarks; no one has been able to acquire any of this substance since then.

plant_rub_effects.short_description: Grow this plant 20 extra hours in 5 minutes!

PlantAdvancement.title: Need a Rift?
PlantAdvancement.description: Speeding up progress with Rift Powder is easy enough. Just toss it onto a plant and watch it grow!

possession_archetypes.name: Wormhole Powder
possession_archetypes.description: The rarest, most pure time acceleration substance in the universe ... so rare, even the ancients only alluded to its existence ... said to be able to call forth the ancient worm of time herself ...

plant_rub_effects.short_description: Grow this plant for 69 extra hours in 2 minutes!

possession_archetypes.name: Land Deed
possession_archetypes.description: Entitles the holder to a new plot of land, if they have the experience to handle it, of course.

possession_archetypes.name: Land Grant
possession_archetypes.description: A much rarer, much more valuable land deed that can grant you land even if you don't have enough experience.

possession_archetypes.name: Cytrus Staff
possession_archetypes.description: Energy overflows from this staff, with orange lightning arcing from Cyl to Cyl, sending them into overdrive. Overdrive Cyl can craft and produce yields 50% faster!

advancement.title: Cytrus Staff Bonus
advancement.description: Having a Cytrus Staff in your inventory increases the yield speed of this Coffea Cyl 35%!

possession_archetypes.name: Jungleboard
possession_archetypes.description: Click clack. Clickity clack click. That is the sound that Hacker Vibes Vines are lost in. Lost to a trance, they let out more VIbes than ever with a 50% boost to yield speed.

advancement.title: Jungleboard Bonus
advancement.description: Having a Jungleboard in your inventory increases the yield speed of this Hacker Vibes Vine by 50%!

possession_archetypes.name: Kingpin
possession_archetypes.description: The majesty and might of this Rolling Pin has grown after being bathed in bressence, and the terror it causes within Bracti now keep them at a 50% boost to yield speed.

advancement.title: Rolling Pin Bonus
advancement.description: Having a Kingpin in your inventory increases the yield speed of this Bractus 50%!

possession_archetypes.name: Cyl Wand
possession_archetypes.description: Once a regular stick, this wand is lined with gems, giving it the ability to boost the yield speed of Coffea Cyl plants by 20%.

advancement.title: Cyl Wand Bonus
advancement.description: Having a Cyl Wand in your inventory increases the yield speed of this Coffea Cyl 20%!

possession_archetypes.name: Vine Keyboard
possession_archetypes.description: The loud clacking of this keyboard's keys enchant Hacker Vibes Vines, sending those who hear it into a trancelike state wherein they grow 20% faster.

advancement.title: Vine Keyboard Bonus
advancement.description: Having a Vine Keyboard in your inventory increases the yield speed of this Hacker Vibes Vine by 20%!

possession_archetypes.name: Rolling Pin
possession_archetypes.description: Bracti fear the Rolling Pin more than almost any other tool, and in the hands of the right wielder, it will inspire them to work harder with a 20% boost to the speed of yields.

advancement.title: Rolling Pin Bonus
advancement.description: Having a Rolling Pin in your inventory increases the yield speed of this Bractus 20%!

possession_archetypes.name: Cyl Egg
possession_archetypes.description: Veins of pure arcane energy course throughout the egg, and holding it quickly makes your hands shaky and numb.

possession_archetypes.name: Hacker Egg
possession_archetypes.description: If you put your ear up to this egg, you can hear the sounds of a keyboard clacking. And profanity. Lots and lots of profanity...

possession_archetypes.name: Bread Egg
possession_archetypes.description: If you knock gently on this egg, it sounds like the crisp outer shell of hardtack. Petition to change its name to 'Breagg.' No? ... okay fine.

possession_archetypes.name: crystcyl
possession_archetypes.description: The humming noise coming from this compressed crystal is powerful enough to roast marshmallows. I'm not kidding! The marshmallows glow orange and discharge static on your tongue, but have a delicious coffee flavor!

possession_archetypes.name: hacksprit
possession_archetypes.description: Dude, I'm seriously kind of amazed at the power of duct tape. There's no way that these five Hacker Spirits should be able to stick together like this. It's mind blowing.

possession_archetypes.name: bressence
possession_archetypes.description: Seriously, don't eat bressence. It might sound like a quick way to get five meals in the time it takes to get one. It's not. Just don't. The last guy to try it was on the toilet for ... well, I'll spare you the gory details.

possession_archetypes.name: Cyl Crystal
possession_archetypes.description: This crystal pops, buzzes, and warps the space around it. Soft, warm lights dance within the crystal's facets.

possession_archetypes.name: Hacker Spirit
possession_archetypes.description: It does not, as a matter of fact, smell like Teen Spirit. Except for when it does. The air is ripe with it whenever new things are being created.

possession_archetypes.name: Bread Essence
possession_archetypes.description: It may be whole wheat, but don't hold that against it. Its rich, freshly-baked aroma triggers overwhelming nostalgia and a gentle, thoughtful sense of calm.

possession_archetypes.name: Coffea Cyl Seed
possession_archetypes.description: A special species of coffee, descended from Coffea arabica and a host of other species. Instead of beans, this plant is grown for the clusters of crystals which grow on its limbs, inside of which mystical forces of the universe coalesce.

possession_archetypes.name: Hacker Vibes Vine Seed
possession_archetypes.description: Just holding the sprout in your hands fills you with the desire to make something! Surely, this seed is in for some amazing things.

possession_archetypes.name: Bractus Seed
possession_archetypes.description: Doughy, yet still somehow prickly. It smells slightly of yeast, and promises to grow into something in between a fresh loaf of sourdough and a certain Sonoran cactus.

possession_archetypes.name: Brognark Pendant
possession_archetypes.description: Etched on this Ancient Amulet are the crude visages of four major Brognarkian deities: Gorbgar the Slaughterer, Bognard the Stomper, Varink the Nabber, and Fordenk the Chanter. The exact purpose of this unholy object is unknown, but it is said to be able to slightly boost the speed and size of yields from any plant.

advancement.title: Brognark Blessings
advancement.description: The haunting glow of the Brognark Pendant increases the yield speed and size of any plant by 0.165171300764919700743822803694%.

advancement.title: Brognark Blessings
advancement.description: The haunting glow of the Brognark Pendant increases the yield speed and size of any plant by 0.165171300764919700743822803694%.

possession_archetypes.name: Tinkerspore
possession_archetypes.description: This small spore is quite colorful. It often sticks itself to machinery, showing an innate attraction to strange contraptions.

possession_archetypes.name: Aloe Avanta Seed
possession_archetypes.description: A strange seed that kind of smells of hand sanitizer. It emits a faint blue light that makes the earth around it glow.

possession_archetypes.name: Tinkerpart
possession_archetypes.description: A mysterious, mechanical scrap that can only be handled by masterful craftsmen. It smells and feels a bit damp.

possession_archetypes.name: Tinkermultitool
possession_archetypes.description: A wieldly tool for only the finest craftsmen, this is the trade tool of a Tinkerstool. With the power of all three tools combined, this tool takes on the abilities of all its predecessors doubled.

advancement.title: Tremendous Tinkering
advancement.description: The tinkertool trio that this tool comes from gives it the abilities of all three - doubled in fact!

advancement.title: Tremendous Tinkering
advancement.description: The tinkertool trio that this tool comes from gives it the abilities of all three - doubled in fact!

advancement.title: Tremendous Tinkering
advancement.description: The tinkertool trio that this tool comes from gives it the abilities of all three - doubled in fact!

possession_archetypes.name: Tinkersledge
possession_archetypes.description: No one expects a mushroom to have a heavy-duty hammer, but here it is. Being just a bit springy, crafting with this hammer takes precision, and using it will allow a 1.5% chance at double the crafting yield!

advancement.title: Looks Like a Nail...
advancement.description: Not much can't be solved by a good whack with a hammer! This one somehow even gives a 1.5% chance that you get double the crafts!

possession_archetypes.name: Tinkerdriver
possession_archetypes.description: A carefully crafted tool that allows careful crafting. Having this tool available allows for a 4% chance to have some of your crafting resources returned.

advancement.title: Screws Loose
advancement.description: The precision of this new new screwdriver is crazy! Just like you'd be without it's 4% craft return chance!

possession_archetypes.name: Tinkerlight
possession_archetypes.description: While this flashlight seems to be quite normal at a glance, it can filter light through artificial gills to refract light into an array of shapes and shades. It also has the unique ability of boosting crafting speed by 30%.

advancement.title: Speed of Light
advancement.description: Through it's many lenses and filters, it's hard not to be hypnotized by this tool's fantastic lights. It somehow makes crafting 30% faster.

possession_archetypes.name: Crystalline Buzzwing Bagling
possession_archetypes.description: A curious flying bag which is sometimes tied to a goblin folk legend. Upon opening you can usually find quite a few treats.

possession_archetypes.name: Spirited Buzzwing Bagling
possession_archetypes.description: Magical bags such as this are rumored to have been commonplace in a time long past. It is bound to have some magical items inside.

possession_archetypes.name: Doughy Buzzwing Bagling
possession_archetypes.description: The secret to the creation of these rare winged bags was supposedly lost, making it rather curious that they are turning up around plants. Opening it may give way to fantastic rewards.

possession_archetypes.name: Crystalline Buzzwing Boxling
possession_archetypes.description: A flightful box of amber with a nice shine to it. Other than being a good mirror, it is sure to contain something of worth.

possession_archetypes.name: Spirited Buzzwing Boxling
possession_archetypes.description: Infused with the might of duct tape, this box flies strong, wings flapping rhythmically. The box itself is worth trying to open for the hope of good loot.

possession_archetypes.name: Doughy Buzzwing Boxling
possession_archetypes.description: For a box made of dough, this box holds itself together well, while still being a bit malleable. Treasure is to be found inside.

possession_archetypes.name: Crystalline Buzzwing Boxlet
possession_archetypes.description: At the correct angle, this box reflects brilliant lights that mesmerize those who see it. Though it's telling that there is treasure to be discovered, the box's design itself makes it seem like a replica of an old goblin blueprint.

possession_archetypes.name: Spirited Buzzwing Boxlet
possession_archetypes.description: The soft humming of this boxes wing is almost musical in nature, sounding like an ancient hymn of an old goblin tribe. Maybe inside you'll find some of their legendary treasure.

possession_archetypes.name: Doughy Buzzwing Boxlet
possession_archetypes.description: From the corner of one's eye, it seems that the dough on this box occasionally shifts and slides, like it has been granted life by powerful magicks, known only to the ancients. One knows they can find valuable trinkets within this enchanted box.

possession_archetypes.name: Crystalline Buzzwing Megabox
possession_archetypes.description: This box laden with crystals often lights up with strange magicks, similarly to a rumored piece of magitech made by the Brognarks. Bounty and wealth are promised by this box.

possession_archetypes.name: Spirited Buzzwing Megabox
possession_archetypes.description: The melodious buzzings of this box remind of a song of the fabled and revered Brognark tribe. The song hints at a glorious treasure, which you may be holding now.

possession_archetypes.name: Doughy Buzzwing Megabox
possession_archetypes.description: The way in which this box's outsides are animated emulate those the great Brognark civilization. Whoever made this box probably inserted items of much value.

possession_archetypes.name: Volatile Vial
possession_archetypes.description: A glass bottle which occasionally lights up with sparks. Some of this energy escapes into whatever it holds, limiting its number of uses.

possession_archetypes.name: Cyllicizing Coffee Concoction
possession_archetypes.description: This chemical craze commits quite the catastrophic capabilities to Coffea Cyl plants, contributing a capacity for increasing the size of their neighbors' yield speeds by 10% and their yield sizes by 5%.

item_application.short_description: Give this Coffea Cyl 10% neighbor speed and 5% neighbor size boosts!

PlantAdvancement.title: Concoction Collaboration
PlantAdvancement.description: With the power of fermented sugar, this Cyl rouses its neighbors and gives them a 10% boost to yield speed along with a 5% boost to yield size.

PlantAdvancement.title: Concoction Collaboration
PlantAdvancement.description: With the power of fermented sugar, this Cyl rouses its neighbors and gives them a 10% boost to yield speed along with a 5% boost to yield size.

possession_archetypes.name: Vibefying Vinefying Elixir
possession_archetypes.description: Having a Hacker Vibes Vine quaff this potion has quite the effect on them, allowing them to boost the size of their neighbors' yield speeds and sizes by 10% and 5% respectively.

item_application.short_description: Give this Hacker Vibes Vine 10% neighbor speed and 5% neighbor size boosts!

PlantAdvancement.title: Vinedication and Dedication
PlantAdvancement.description: This drunken Vine is faithful and loyal to its friends, who gain a 10% yield speed boost with a 5% boost to yield size.

PlantAdvancement.title: Vinedication and Dedication
PlantAdvancement.description: This drunken Vine is faithful and loyal to its friends, who gain a 10% yield speed boost with a 5% boost to yield size.

possession_archetypes.name: Bractification Brew
possession_archetypes.description: This beaut of a butt can be boozed in a bout on a boat or a butte ... or just about anywhere. Bracti that drink it increase the speed of neighboring Bracti's yields by 10%, with their yield sizes being increased by 5%.

item_application.short_description: Give this Bractus 10% neighbor speed and 5% neighbor size boosts!

PlantAdvancement.title: Bolder and Better
PlantAdvancement.description: This Bractus, having downed a fresh brew, inspires confidence in its pals, increasing their yield speed by 10% and yield size by 5%.

PlantAdvancement.title: Bolder and Better
PlantAdvancement.description: This Bractus, having downed a fresh brew, inspires confidence in its pals, increasing their yield speed by 10% and yield size by 5%.

possession_archetypes.name: Scintillating Cyllicizing Coffee Concoction
possession_archetypes.description: An aromatic potion which, as well as being able to wake up a dead elephant, can magically change a plant into a Coffea Cyl.

item_application.short_description: Turn this plant into a Coffea Cyl!

possession_archetypes.name: Vivifying Vibefying Vinefying Elixir
possession_archetypes.description: This curious tincture smells like a fresh rainstorm, and makes the air around it feel humid. It also has the power to make any plant into a Hacker Vibes Vine.

item_application.short_description: Turn this plant into a Hacker Vibes Vine!

possession_archetypes.name: Bold Bractification Brew
possession_archetypes.description: As this golden liquid seems to be silky and smooth, it's quite strange that the potion is actually quite dry. Pouring it on a plant transforms it into a Bractus.

item_application.short_description: Turn this plant into a Bractus!

possession_archetypes.name: Tinker Tincture
possession_archetypes.description: A nanobot mixture filled to the brim with craft beer. The nanobots inside can enhance any plant's dexterity, allowing them to craft 10% faster.

item_application.short_description: Increase this plant's crafting speed by 10%!

PlantAdvancement.title: Alcoholically Apt
PlantAdvancement.description: Filled with energy, and tiny robots, this plant gets a 10% boost to the speed of any craft!

possession_archetypes.name: Terrific Tinker Tincture
possession_archetypes.description: After some software updates, as well as some additives for flavor, this mechanical mixture can improve crafting speed by 30%.

item_application.short_description: Increase this plant's crafting speed by 30%!

PlantAdvancement.title: More alcohol always makes things better, as do more nanobots. With their powers combined, this plant gets a 30% boost to crafting speed!

possession_archetypes.name: Powder Keg
possession_archetypes.description: A bottle of brew that is only a tad bit explosive. It has enough latent energy to boost the power of Powders on plants by 15%.

item_application.short_description: Boost the effect of Powders on this plant by 15%!

PlantAdvancement.title: High and Dry
PlantAdvancement.description: Everyone knows alcohol isn't a substitute for water, but using this flammable fluid has given a 15% increse to the effect of Powders on your plant!

possession_archetypes.name: Portent Powder Keg
possession_archetypes.description: Handle with caution. Upgrading this potion has has caused it to become more than just a bit explosive. Though keeping the fabric of reality safe is a concern, the risk is worth it when making powders 35% as effective for neighbors.

item_application.short_description: Boost the effect of Powders on this plant's neighbors by 35%!

PlantAdvancement.title: Powder Proficient
PlantAdvancement.description: Though it feels somewhat heavy and is a bit cold to the touch, the 35% boost to Powders from this potion undeniably makes it worth consuming.

possession_archetypes.name: Nest Egg
possession_archetypes.description: A special egg made to help new Hacksteaders get started. Hatching it guarantees some Powders to speed up plant growth, as well as quite a few crafting materials. Happy Hacksteading!

possession_archetypes.name: Bagling Egg
possession_archetypes.description: This Egg is the manifestation of loot contained in a Bagling!

possession_archetypes.name: Boxling Egg
possession_archetypes.description: Bagling loot is somehow stored inside this Egg with the power of mysterious arcana.

possession_archetypes.name: Boxlet Egg
possession_archetypes.description: With an occasional hum and flutter, this Egg will hatch into all the loot from Boxlets.

possession_archetypes.name: Megabox Egg
possession_archetypes.description: Megabox loot is magically transferred into this bright and cheery Egg!
